headerDisplay: To authenticate with MELCloud, click the **Settings** (⚙️) button above and follow the OAuth flow. After authentication, your settings will appear here.

refreshToken.title: Refresh Token
refreshToken.description: Automatically set via OAuth. Do NOT edit manually!

refreshInterval.title: Device Status Refresh Interval (seconds)
refreshInterval.description: How often to poll MELCloud API for device status updates. Default is 30 seconds for responsive updates. Increase if you want fewer API calls. Note: Changes made via HomeKit update instantly (within 2 seconds).

exposeTemperatureSensor.title: Expose Temperature Sensor
exposeTemperatureSensor.description: Expose a separate temperature sensor for each AC unit. This allows HomeKit automations to trigger based on temperature (HomeKit doesn't allow automations from the built-in temperature on HeaterCooler accessories). You can hide the extra sensor tile in the Home app if desired.

fanSpeedButtons.title: Fan Speed Buttons
fanSpeedButtons.description: Create separate switch buttons for fan speed control. Each button shows its speed clearly (e.g. 'Bedroom Fan Auto'). More intuitive than a percentage slider.

fanSpeedControl.title: Fan Speed Control (Virtual Fan)
fanSpeedControl.description: Create a virtual fan device for fan speed control. Fan shows Off when AC is off or fan is in Auto mode. Fan speed is controlled via percentage (0%=Auto, 20%=1, 40%=2, 60%=3, 80%=4, 100%=5). This is similar to Home Assistant template fan.

vaneControl.title: Vane Control
vaneControl.description: Control vane/swing position. 'Buttons' creates separate Auto and Swing switches. 'Fan Device' creates a virtual fan that turns on/off swing mode. Buttons are OFF when AC is OFF, and mutually exclusive.

swingControl.title: Swing Control (Additional)
swingControl.description: Additional swing control option. Creates a separate virtual fan device for swing control (can be used together with vaneControl=buttons if you want both).
